history.narrative: Law 19-125, the “Uniform Collaborative Law Act of 2012”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-43, which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 4, 2012, and February 7, 2012, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 1, 2012, it was assigned Act No. 19-319 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-125 became effective on May 9, 2012.
